PageWidgetPortable.Title: Geração de itens por almoxarifado
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: Selecione abaixo os itens a serem associados à implantação.
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PD_ALMOXARIFADOVARIACOES.IMPLANTACAODESALDOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>5</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>false</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.EMINVENTARIO = 'N') AND (A.PRODUTO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM PD_PRODUTOS WHERE EMPRESA = @EMPRESA AND FILIAL IN @FILIAIS AND ATIVO = 'S' AND TIPO IN (1, 2, 4, 5))) AND (A.ESTOQUETOTAL <= 0) AND A.ALMOXARIFADO = :ALMOXARIFADO</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>false</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
